text: Peter Liechti (8 January 1951 - 6 April 2014) was a Swiss movie director. He directed over 100 Swiss-German movies. He was nominated for many awards. Most of his movies were shown at the Berlin International Film Festival (BIFF). Recently, he was awarded an honorary awards at the BIFF in 2013. He was born in St. Gallen, Switzerland. Liechti died on 6 April 2014, aged 63. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Swiss movie directors Category:Swiss movie producers Category:People from St. Gallen
title: Peter Liechti
